definition: mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
old form of 崖 (cliff) and 涯 (bank)
sheer cliffs and precipitous rock faces (idiom)
lit. to rein in the horse at the edge of the precipice (idiom)/fig. to act in the nick of time
sheer cliffs and precipitous rock faces (idiom)
rock carving/cliff engraving/words carved into cliff face
cliff/steep slope/fig. arrogant and difficult person
ancient name for Hainan Island 海南島|海南岛[Hai3 nan2 Dao3]
(bird species of China) sand martin (Riparia riparia)
(bird species of China) common murre (Uria aalge)

sentences.english: A new graveyard has been added near the east coast of the Hinterlands at the Overlook Cliffs.
sentences.chinese: 在辛特兰望海崖处增加了一个新的墓地。

sentences.english: Stream north Huping cliff, towering cliffs, towering like a bottle-shaped pot and name.
sentences.chinese: 涧北有壶瓶崖，危崖万丈，突兀类壶瓶状而名。

sentences.english: The primitive rock drawings on Jiangjun Cliff record the way of life of early humanity.
sentences.chinese: 古老的将军崖原始岩画记录着原始人类的生活。

sentences.english: Some 50 years ago, Waldo had climbed to the base of this cliff, then stared up in wonder.
sentences.chinese: 五十多年前，沃尔多曾爬到崖脚，好奇地盯着上方。

sentences.english: Jack: The Virgin Cliffs. Nice name for a Virtuous mission.
sentences.chinese: 贞女崖？这名字跟贞洁行动倒很配。

sentences.english: Their bodies were spotted at the foot of the cliffs on Sunday evening and were recovered on Monday.
sentences.chinese: 周日晚上，他们的尸体坠落在崖脚，周一被人收敛。

sentences.english: The simplified mechanics model of soft stratum deformation is built up.
sentences.chinese: 建立链子崖软弱层变形的简化力学模型。

sentences.english: Cliff is soaring Zhenwu Tati heaven place.
sentences.chinese: 飞升崖是真武大帝仙游的地方。

sentences.english: About one hundred people lived in this cliff dwelling during the thirteenth century.
sentences.chinese: 在十三世纪，大约有100人居住在这个崖居中。

sentences.english: When the ocean waves flush ashore cliff time.
sentences.chinese: 当海浪冲上岸崖的时侯。

sentences.english: The wished to locate its new factory beside the river.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司希望毖崖氦敞砷在河边。

sentences.english: The tiger down to the cliff and fights with the lion at the bottom of cliff.
sentences.chinese: 跳下悬崖的老虎与崖下的狮子展开激烈的打斗。

sentences.english: It's like I throw you off a cliff, but rush to the bottom to catch you.
sentences.chinese: 这就像我将你推下悬崖，却又拼命地冲到崖底接住你。

sentences.english: Niche refers to dig for the original rock cliff, to set the Buddha.
sentences.chinese: 龛原指掘凿岩崖为空，以安置佛像之所。

sentences.english: China travel, Chongqing Dazu Cliff Rock Carvings, Baoding Mountain.
sentences.chinese: 中国旅游，重庆大足石刻崖，保定山。

sentences.english: It is difficult to get to it.
sentences.chinese: 想要到崖宫是一件很困难的事。

definition: halfway up a mountain/lit. waist of mountain
Lianyun district of Lianyungang city 連雲港市|连云港市[Lian2 yun2 gang3 shi4], Jiangsu
